meanings.sent1: The cat had a whiskered face.
meanings.sent3: The whiskered dog looked like a little furry gentleman.
meanings.sent4: The whiskered squirrel seemed to be whispering secrets to the wind.
meanings.sent5: Her whiskered cheeks were soft to the touch.

meanings.sent1: The whiskered fish swam gracefully in the water.
meanings.sent2: His whiskered chin tickled her cheek.
meanings.sent3: The whiskered plant seemed to be growing its own tiny forest.
meanings.sent4: The whiskered caterpillar crawled slowly along the branch.
meanings.sent5: The whiskered edges of the leaf caught the sunlight beautifully.

meanings.definition: A person or animal with whiskers
meanings.sent1: The whiskered on the farm caught mice.
meanings.sent2: The whiskered in the mirror looked back at me.
meanings.sent3: The whiskered at the pet store was very friendly.
meanings.sent4: The whiskered in the cartoon wore a top hat.
meanings.sent5: The whiskered in the zoo purred softly.
